Text: What's up with the russian audio crap?
sgleder> simply load it in mkvmerge GUI and deselect the russian audio and subs then save it again. That will cut away almost 1GB as well.
OR JUST SELECT THE 3RD AUDIO TRACK IN WHATEVER MEDIA PLAYER YOUR USE.

Personally I would never include dubbed audio tracks. Original is always the best. It is how the director intended the film to be presented. 

Subs are obviously a necessity and should be included as optional.
